posts.name: Yash Aggarwal
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.53.0-beta.1. If youre interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

  • Additional small tweaks, bug fixes, and assorted plans for the future.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.52.0-beta.1v7.53.0-beta.1 路 signalapp/Signal-Desktop 路 GitHub

link_counts.title: Comparing v7.52.0-beta.1...v7.53.0-beta.1 路 signalapp/Signal-Desktop 路 GitHub
Beta feedback for the upcoming Desktop 7.52 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.53.0-beta.1

43 new commits since 7.52.0-beta.1:

Show commits

  • v7.53.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Wrap mention blot react root with emoji localization provider [2]

  • Fix @electron/rebuild pnpm issue [3]

  • Add offline state to BackupMediaDownloadProgress [4]

  • Reduce ICU book build size [5]

  • Fun picker: Emoji skin tones picker and recent gifs [6]

  • Fix test-electron on macos CI [7]

  • Fix reaction skin tone picker [8]

  • Update support URL for startup DB error dialog [9]

  • CallingLobby: Ensure your avatar is centered when camera is off [10]

  • FunPicker: Keep emoji picker open on select for composition inputs [11]

  • Simplify preload cache generation [12]

  • Fix flakey edits mock test [13]

  • MessageReceiver: Process messages from queue before websocket [14]

  • Fix join group modal [15]

  • Calling PiP enhancements [16]

  • Add backup validation to settings [17]

  • Use signed nsis package [18]

  • Fix dynamic imports in bundled app [19]

  • Remove fallback CDSI implementation [20]

  • Be resilient to invalid incrementalMac value [21]

  • Fix digest for nsis-3.0.4.1.7z [22]

  • Show low-disk-space warning during backup media download [23]

  • Fix batch attachment download renaming and overwriting files [24]

  • Fix out-of-disk-space test [25]

  • Fix roundtripping of voice notes with body [26]

  • Upgrade electron-builder to 26.0.12 [27]

  • Fix backup export error for invalid serviceId [28]

  • Remove Release Notes Hash Check [29]

  • Show list of members in a group in ConversationHero [30]

  • Release notes for 7.52 [31]

  • Update strings [32]

  • Update DNS fallback [33]

  • Improve validation of username searches [34]

  • Fix copy of emoji from message bubble [35]

  • Calling: Move VideoSupport.ts to Client [36]

  • Simplify conflict resolution in storage service [37]

  • Release notes UI fixes [38]

  • Logging improvements for sessions [39]

  • Update feature flag setup for funPicker [40]

  • Fix ConverationHero Title for 1:1 Conversations [41]

  • Update strings [42]

  • 7.53.0-beta.1 [43]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.52.0-beta.1v7.53.0-beta.1

posts.name: 吼葛
posts.cooked:
Not sure if you can do anything about it, but sending GIFs takes 5+ seconds on VPN; ProtonVPN specifically, and Im connected to a server thats relatively close.
